description: This marine mobile armor is armed with 14 torpedo launchers and a pair of massive claws, which it can use to tear open the undersides of enemy ships. The Grabro can also take on airborne targets, lurking beneath the surface of the water and attacking with a pair of missile launchers. Zeon submarine captain Flanagan Boone uses the Grabro to attack the White Base as it crosses the Atlantic Ocean.
name: MAM-07 Grabro
